import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import AuthContext from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);return user?children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});// Redirige al login si no está autenticado
};export default ProtectedRoute;
